content.value: Ethically woven from the finest European flax, our mid-weight linen quilt is the perfect year-round layer that feels as good as it looks. Pre-washed for superior softness and a perfectly lived-in vibe, our heirloom-quality linen only gets softer over time. Set includes quilt and two shams.
Filled with 180-gsm of 100% recycled polyester for ultimate loft
Breathable, yet insulating; best for year-round comfort
Set includes quilt and two shams
Twin and Full/Queen include standard shams, King/Cal King includes king shams
Free of harmful chemicals and toxins
Launder with our 100% New Zealand Wool Dryer Balls for added softness

Machine washable. We recommend machine washing on the gentle or delicate cycle with like colors, with cold water. Line dry, or tumble dry low and remove promptly. Use a steamer as needed. Use a hot iron as needed.

productDetails.productDetails:
• Woven from 100% European Flax
  • Linen: 150-gsm
  • Filled with 180-gsm of 100% recycled polyester for ultimate loft
  • Breathable, yet insulating; best for year-round comfort
  • Set includes quilt and two shams
  • Twin and Full/Queen include standard shams, King/Cal King includes king shams
  • 4'' quilted squares
  • Free of harmful chemicals and toxins
  • Launder with our 100% New Zealand Wool Dryer Balls for added softness
  • Made with care in China

content.value:
Happy space in progress ✨⠀
⠀
Sometimes we get so wrapped up in quick before and afters (hi, me 🙋‍♀️) it’s easy forget most rooms take a time to unfold. A slow chipping away to create and transform.

productDescription.productDescription:
Woven from 100% organic extra long staple cotton, our percale duvet cover feels as good as it looks. Cool, crisp, and lightweight; it's the perfect choice for hot sleepers and warm climates. Commonly found on 5-star hotel beds.


Organic cotton is made without harmful toxins like pesticides or insecticides, making it safer for the farmers who harvest it, the consumers who use it, and the environment.

Not a fan of flat sheets? Then this is the sheet set for you. Set includes fitted sheet and two pillowcases. Woven from 100% organic extra long staple cotton, these percale sheets are lightweight, crisp, and super cool.


Organic cotton is made without harmful toxins like pesticides or insecticides, making it safer for the farmers who harvest it, the consumers who use it, and the environment.

productDescription.productDescription: These organic percale sheets are lightweight, cool, and super crisp - exactly the way percale should be. 400 thread count and woven from 100% organic extra long staple cotton, they're perfect for hot sleepers and warm climates.

content.value: I have been so lazy about posting here on my feed but today I wanted to give my friends @onequince a big shout out for these amazing Belgian linen coziest sheets and duvet cover they gifted me.

content.value: We partner with factories who have a commitment to responsible production. This means paying workers fairly and doing their best to produce in a way that reduces damage to the environment.

We're working hard to use sustainably produced materials that minimize our impact on the planet, such as organic cotton, responsibly sourced wool, and finishes that are free of harmful chemicals and toxins.
We believe in creating high quality, functional, and timeless essentials that will be used or worn for a long time, and won't end up in a landfill.

Thanks for your review.

visible online.

content.value: "Quince’s new rug collection is hand knotted and tufted by artisans in India. Best of all, the prices are fairly reasonable for the top-notch quality you’re getting."
"We've got you covered with this very affordable cashmere sweater that somehow clocks in at a miraculous 50 buckeroos."
"New Online Fashion Brand Aims To Get Eco-Friendly Clothes From Factory-To-Closet At Affordable Prices."
"While D2C brands have changed the way we shop,
is looking to change retail even more dramatically."
"A cashmere crewneck for $50?! It’s now a reality — in 10 colors — thanks to Quince."
"The brand connects with factories to sell direct to the customer, promising consumers better prices and factories with better margins."
"The Quince Organic Percale Luxe Sheet Set collection is an excellent choice for anyone who sleeps hot at night."
"You can get a cashmere sweater for only $50 from this radically transparent basics company."
"My next plane outfit when I can travel again."
"These Luxurious Linen Sheets Make Me Feel Like I’m Sleeping in a Fancy Hotel"
